item.title: Dark bow problems
item.dc:creator: @nobiwa666 nobiwa666
item.description:
@nobiwa666 wrote:

hello gusy i maked dark bow special attack
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15156 && specialAmount <= 99) {//dbow
specialDamage = 0;
specialDamage2 = 0;
sendMessage(“You do not have enough special energy left.”);
}
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15156 && specialAmount >= 99) {//dbow
startAnimation(426);
startAnimation(426);
specialDamage = 10 + misc.random(40);
specialDamage2 = 50;
specialAmount -= 100;
}

but he wont do it
before the bow ranged it worked[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 08, 2008, 10:11:58 AM[/size][hr]an d another problem it hits ppl with fist and npc with arrows plz hellp
